thread.title: Gossip & Rumours: Jose Mourinho prepared to sell three Manchester United stars to provide Antoine Griezmann transfer cash
thread.title_full: Gossip & Rumours: Jose Mourinho prepared to sell three Manchester United stars to provide Antoine Griezmann transfer cash

title: Gossip & Rumours: Jose Mourinho prepared to sell three Manchester United stars to provide Antoine Griezmann transfer cash
text:
By Game Yetu Saturday, February 4th 2017 at 13:11 [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Jose Mourinho is prepared to sell three Manchester United stars this summer to provide cash to spend on Antoine Griezmann. 
The Red Devils last week denied reports that Griezmann had agreed a summer move to Old Trafford, but the Athletico Madrid playmaker is still expected to be the club’s major signing at the end of the season. 
Sources say the huge transfer fee will be compensated by a number of departures from the Premier league giants, with Wayne Rooney, Anthony Martial and Marouane Fellaini under the spotlight. 
Captain Rooney has been repeatedly linked with a move to the Chinese Super League while Martial is said to be struggling to feature under Mourinho’s squad.
